text: is an island in Nishi-ku, Fukuoka, Japan. The island was seriously damaged by 2005 Fukuoka earthquake. The affected areas in the island were reconstructed by 2008. ==Access== * **Hakata Port - Genkai Island PortFukuoka Municipal Ferry Service Timetable File:Fukuoka Municipal Ferry Service New Genkai.jpg|New Genkai at Genkai Island Port ==References== Category:Geography of Fukuoka Category:Islands of Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Genkai Island
